page.title: 16LIFE STYLES CONTD.
page.content: THE ROLE OF THE FATHER HAS ALSO CHANGED. IT IS STILL QUITE RARE TO SEE A MAN PUSH A PUSHCHAIR BUT IS GETTING MORE COMMON. MORE MEN ARE PRESENT AT THE BIRTH OF THEIR OFFSPRING, ALTHOUGH THERE ARE NO ANTE-NATAL CLASSES FOR MEN. THE ROLE OF WOMEN IS ALSO CHANGING AND WIDENING. MORE WOMEN ARE WORKING IN PAID EMPLOYMENT OR ARE TAKING A PART IN THE BUISNESS SIDE OF THEIR FARMS. THERE IS EVEN TALK OF DAUGHTERS INHERITING A FARM. WOMEN AND MEN STILL TEND TO HAVE SEPERATE INTERESTS. IN THE CHAPELS FOR EXAMPLE, RAISING MONEY FOR OVERSEAS MISSIONS IS THE WORK OF THE WOMENS FELLOWSHIP. SOME STILL FEEL UNCOMFORTABLE WITH WOMEN TAKING OFFICE IN THE CHURCH. THE FIRST WOMAN MINISTER HAS JUST BEEN APPOINTED TO THE CIRCUIT.
